nodes.text: Maggy the Gorgon's was a tavern in a section of Mos Espa on Tatooine that was not controlled by the Hutts. The tasty drink, ruby bliel, was known to have been served there. It was often a dangerous place to enter, home to plenty of brawls. Shmi Skywalker asked her son Anakin to buy his ruby bliel from here, rather than from the Blue Brubb. It was at this location that Anakin learned about the Jedi Knights from an old spacer.
